CustomField.description: When enabled, the agent is instructed to explain the action it is about to take in plain language before executing a tool. This enhances transparency and user trust by making the agent's decisions visible.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this to make the agent explain its actions. The agent will generate a user-facing message describing its next action before calling a tool, providing a more transparent and trustworthy experience.
CustomField.label: Enable Action Transparency
